responses.text: It is another term for 'executive summary'.
It is a document which stipulates the term of the investment.
Early stage firms with short-term growth potential
Early stage firms with long-term growth potential
Early stage firms which do not plan for growth

questions.text: What is meant by Post-money valuation?

responses.text: It is the expected value of the company after it has received the venture capital investment.
It is the expected value of the company before it has received the venture capital investment.
It is the expected value of the company after five years.

questions.text: What do veto rights allow the venture capitalist to do?

responses.text: Overturn decisions made by the company directors
Call board meetings at any point

questions.text: A company with a limited operating history means that

responses.text: It was set up at least 10 years before
It is no more than 2 years old
